title: Hotline introduced to report gas & fuel distribution irregularities
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Presidential Media Division has introduced a number to report any irregularities in the supply or distribution of fuel and gas.
Accordingly, anyone can lodge a complaint regarding gas and fuel supply or distribution irregularities in their area via 0711691691.
Youth protesters set up township in front of Presidents Office, in Sri Lanka.
